modName: Nord Plate Recolour Black_Silver and Black_Black
summary: Small recolor of the Plate Armor set male.
descriptionHtml:
V1.0
New File is only Black, still a little bit shiny but definetly more black. Couldn\'t make any Screens sorry, if you use it, please submit one or two, would appreciate it. :)

V1.2
Found another small glitch and edited a little more, I apologize again today is not my best Mod day as it seems... :/

V 1.1
The small silver glitch on Screen 3 is now fixed, saw it after the upload sorry.

Install:
Unpack the dds files into: \"Data/textures/armor/nordplate\"

Uninstall:
Delete the folder: \"Data/textures/armor/nordplate\"

If youi like it, feel free to enjoy it. :)

No copyrights, just for fun.
RavenCane
author: RavenCane
